section.title: How to run Oden Commands
section.para: Oden command can be executed in command line through runc.sh(or runc.cmd) command of bin folder.
section.programlisting: bin/runc.sh history info (In Windows, bin/runc.cmd history info)
section.para: Command can be executed through web console.
9860 is the basic port of Oden Server. Web console is provided in Oden Server not Oden Admin.
